Body: Description: Mail alerts are received late when incident or cap captured any incidents loop the following mail id this related to previous ticket which support team asked to raise support ticket 431542 loop this mail :Jayasuriyan@shaktatech.com;arun@shaktatech.com
Invitation updated. Attendees: No attendees listed
Invitation updated. Attendees: Andre Le Roux
Invitation updated. Attendees: Andre Le Roux, Lokesh N, Jaya Suriyan

What We've Learned Updated: In our remote session we provided the configuration shown in the below screenshots to work with the TLS 1.3 setting enabled. Customer did not use the App password, an APP password is mandatory for the SMTP service to authenticate via Endpoint Protector. 
We have set the hostname to: "smtp-mail.outlook.com"

Customer confirmed that the SMTP issue is resolved.   I will close this case.

Next Steps Updated: I can confirm that the configuration shown in the below screenshots does work with the TLS 1.3 setting enabled. Please note that an APP password is mandatory for the SMTP service to authenticate via Endpoint Protector. 
Could you please reconfigure your SMTP settings to match and be identical to the configurations shown in the below screenshots, retest the scenario and let me know if it works please? 

Please use the hostname "smtp-mail.outlook.com"

Please see below the email which I sent on 6th February, last week Thursday.  As this case was opened for SMTP issue and you confirmed that the SMTP issue is resolved.   I will close this case.
Next Steps Updated: Customer confirmed that the SMTP issue is resolved.   I will close this case.
